definition: to be delirious/to be mentally confused
to be in a state of delirium

sentences.english: Severe cases may progress to confusion and coma.
sentences.chinese: 情况严重的会进一步恶化以致昏迷及神志不清。

sentences.english: Upon entering the construction, visitors have reported feeling dizzy and disorientated.
sentences.chinese: 据进入房间的参观者说，在里面感觉眩晕和神志不清。

sentences.english: No man in his senses would have done so.
sentences.chinese: 没有一个神志清醒的人会这样做。

sentences.english: It is only during the night when she lies in bed that she feels she has a clear mind.
sentences.chinese: 只有晚上躺在床上时，她才感到神志清醒。

sentences.english: They found the man turning from side to side on his bed, still unconscious.
sentences.chinese: 他们发现那人在床上翻来复去，仍然神志不清。

sentences.english: "You always said Rom was conscious, " said the friend.
sentences.chinese: “你总是说罗姆神志清醒，”这位朋友说。

sentences.english: He was unconscious for quite a long time after being admitted to the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 他被接受住院后好长一段时间都神志不清。

sentences.english: Mrs. Cheng really got worried then, because she thought her maid was delirious.
sentences.chinese: 程夫人觉得有点担心，她想她的丫环肯定是神志不清。

sentences.english: A person may become unconscious, not knowing what is happening.
sentences.chinese: 此时人会变得神志不清，对周围发生的事情毫无知觉。

sentences.english: His doctor said Zhao is conscious and has stable vital signs.
sentences.chinese: 主诊医生称患者神志清醒，各项生命体征平稳。

sentences.english: No sane politician is going to entertain the prospect of tax hikes before major elections.
sentences.chinese: 神志清醒的政客绝不会在大选开始前提到增税。

sentences.english: Determine client's neurological status, including level of consciousness ( LOC ).
sentences.chinese: 确定病人神经系统状况，包括神志清醒程度。

sentences.english: For seven years he endured a form of insanity which made him act like an animal.
sentences.chinese: 足有七年的时间，王变得神志失常，像动物般地生活。
他喝酒喝得神志不清了。

sentences.english: You make sense of madness when my sanity hangs by a thread.
sentences.chinese: 当我的神志好似千钧悬于一发，你会了解什么是疯狂。

definition: to be delirious/to be mentally confused
mind/state of mind/attention/(Chinese medicine) psychic constitution
to lose consciousness/to be in a coma/stupor/coma/stunned/disoriented
to be in a state of delirium
